overview: Old Man Gepetto is a drunk and his life has been a mess since his wife left him. One day while sitting in the park, he meets Eve and Eve’s grandmother. Gepetto becomes enchanted by them and offers his help to finish Eve and her grandmother’s sewing until they finally become frequent visitors to Gepetto. Gepetto falls in love again, and Gepetto’s life changes for the better. After seeing him happy, his assistant advises Gepetto not to bury his feelings for too long. On the day he usually remembers his wedding anniversary with his former wife, Gepetto’s invites Eve and her grandmother to dinner.
title: Gepeto
